title: 102 - The Thanksgiving Extravaganza
description: On today's show, the boys discuss what their ultimate Thanksgiving meal is, give a special thank you to The Undertaker (thank you, Take), chat about monkey's receiving human brain cells to make them smarter and more like us, a turtle getting a titanium nose after getting his own nearly ripped off, and much more in an absolutely loaded Pod FOD. Plus Nick unveils a very special Maraldo's Mad Libs for the holiday season. We appreciate you all for listening, have a happy and safe Thanksgiving with your families, and don't forget the Big Friday Sale is still live at store.patmcafeeshow.com where everything is 20% off and everyone who purchases something will be entered in a drawing to win 1 of 3 PS5's. Subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for all things PMI and The Pod related. Enjoy, and Happy Thanksgiving.
